players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I am really concerned about Bob's death last night. Since there is only one mafioso, we need to carefully observe who acts suspiciously to avoid losing more town members."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote her out now before she kills another town member."
Charlie: "Alice's silence is very telling. We can't afford to hesitate—voting her out is our best chance to protect Diana and myself."
